name: ScheduleLandingPage
description:
Schedule a landing page for publication.

This tool schedules a landing page to be published, using HubSpot CMS. It is used when you need to set a specific time for your landing page to go live.

parameters.name: publication_date
parameters.description: The date when the landing page should be published. Use the format YYYY-MM-DD.

value_schema.description: The date the object should transition from scheduled to published.

parameters.name: landing_page_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the landing page to be scheduled for publication.

value_schema.description: The ID of the object to be scheduled.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: publishDate
parameters.description: The date the object should transition from scheduled to published.

value_schema.description: The date the object should transition from scheduled to published.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the object to be scheduled.

value_schema.description: The ID of the object to be scheduled.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
